catalogue.title: The Digital Watchdog: Automating Adverse Event Reporting Intake
catalogue.miniDescription: Build an intelligent, automated system for Adverse Event intake that ensures speed, accuracy, and perfect regulatory auditability.

catalogue.title: Accelerate Discovery: Automating Clinical Trial Participant Pre-screening
catalogue.miniDescription: Build an intelligent pre-screening assistant to dramatically accelerate patient recruitment for clinical trials, helping bring new therapies to patients faster.

catalogue.title: The AI Archivist: Taming Your Regulatory Document Library
catalogue.miniDescription: Build an AI-powered archivist that can understand and answer questions about the content of your vast regulatory document library.

catalogue.title: The End of the Logbook: Automating Lab Sample Intake and Tracking
catalogue.miniDescription: Build a streamlined, automated system using Power Apps that makes lab sample intake fast, accurate, and error-proof.

catalogue.title: The Rep's Co-Pilot: Instant Clinical Answers for Your Sales Force
catalogue.miniDescription: Build an AI-powered 'Rep's Co-Pilot' that acts as an instant-answer expert on clinical data, available 24/7 in Microsoft Teams.

catalogue.title: Clinical Investigator Grant Payment Processing
catalogue.miniDescription: Automate the validation and approval of clinical trial site invoices, ensuring fast, accurate, and auditable payments.

catalogue.title: GxP Training Assignment & Tracking
catalogue.miniDescription: Ensure the right GxP training is assigned to every employee based on their role and that completion is tracked automatically.

catalogue.title: Lab Access Request & Approval
catalogue.miniDescription: Streamline the process for requesting and approving access to secure labs, ensuring proper authorization and a clear audit trail.

catalogue.title: GxP System Change Control Request
catalogue.miniDescription: Digitize and streamline the critical change control process for validated GxP computer systems, ensuring compliance and accelerating changes.

catalogue.title: Marketing Material Request & Approval (MLR)
catalogue.miniDescription: Create a streamlined, auditable digital workflow for the rigorous Medical, Legal, and Regulatory (MLR) review process.

catalogue.title: Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) Provisioning & Archiving
catalogue.miniDescription: Automate the full lifecycle of Electronic Lab Notebooks, from creation and permissioning to secure, read-only archival.
